Uses of Package
comm

  • Packages that use comm 
    Package Description
    base  
    comm  
  • Classes in comm used by base 
    Class and Description
    I_HWI
    I_HWI this is the class is the interface of the Hardware handler.
    I_HWI_Listener
    I_HWI_Listener this is the class is the interface of the Hardware Listener.
    I_PCDI
    I_PCDI this is the interface for the pcdi class.
    I_PCDI_Listener
    I_PCDI_Listener this class is the interface of the PCDI Listener.
    PCDI_COMMANDS
    PCDI_COMMANDS this enum is used for the pcdi commands which can be sent to the device
    PCDI_ERROR_TYPE
    PCDI_ERROR_TYPE this enum is used from the device to inform about about an error
    PCDI_OSCILLOSCOPE_STATE
    PCDI_OSCILLOSCOPE_STATE this enum is used for the oscilloscope answer of the device and informs about the state of the oscilloscope
    PCDI_OscilloscopeData
    PCDI_OscilloscopeData this is the class is used to put the data, sent from the device together to one object (all oscilloscope channels to 1 object)
    PCDI_Parameter
    PCDI_Parameter this abstract class represents a parameter, it consits of a value number, the value type and the value itself
    PCDI_ParameterInfo
    PCDI_ParameterInfo this class represents the information of a parameter including value number, type, permission, name and unit
  • Classes in comm used by comm 
    Class and Description
    CS_Exception
    CS_Exception this is the class is the Checksum-Exception
    I_HWI
    I_HWI this is the class is the interface of the Hardware handler.
    I_HWI_Listener
    I_HWI_Listener this is the class is the interface of the Hardware Listener.
    I_PCDI
    I_PCDI this is the interface for the pcdi class.
    I_PCDI_Listener
    I_PCDI_Listener this class is the interface of the PCDI Listener.
    PCDI_COMMANDS
    PCDI_COMMANDS this enum is used for the pcdi commands which can be sent to the device
    PCDI_ERROR_TYPE
    PCDI_ERROR_TYPE this enum is used from the device to inform about about an error
    PCDI_Message
    PCDI_Message this class is used for generating a bytewise message which can be sent to the device through the hardware-interface.
    PCDI_MESSAGE_TYPE
    PCDI_MESSAGE_TYPE this enum is used as part of the protocol to tell which messagetype is sent/received
    PCDI_OSCILLOSCOPE_COMMAND
    PCDI_OSCILLOSCOPE_COMMAND this enum is used for the oscilloscope start command and tells wether to start only or to execute additional actions
    PCDI_OSCILLOSCOPE_STATE
    PCDI_OSCILLOSCOPE_STATE this enum is used for the oscilloscope answer of the device and informs about the state of the oscilloscope
    PCDI_OscilloscopeData
    PCDI_OscilloscopeData this is the class is used to put the data, sent from the device together to one object (all oscilloscope channels to 1 object)
    PCDI_Parameter
    PCDI_Parameter this abstract class represents a parameter, it consits of a value number, the value type and the value itself
    PCDI_ParameterInfo
    PCDI_ParameterInfo this class represents the information of a parameter including value number, type, permission, name and unit
    PCDI_PERMISSION
    PCDI_PERMISSION this enum is used for parameter info and tells wether the parameter is readable/writeable
    PCDI_TYPES
    PCDI_TYPES this enum is used for parameter value data type
    PCDI_UNIT
    PCDI_TYPES this enum is used for parameter info and tells about the unit of the respective parameter
